title: Gertrude and Toby Meet the Wolf
description: Gertrude the goat and Toby the tortoise are going fishing at Trout Lake for their Friday adventure. While at the lake, they see a little boy being dragged off by a hungry wolf! They follow the wolf and rescue the little boy, but the wolf doesn't give up. He goes after them, determined to get his lunch back!Book 3 in the Gertrude and Toby fairy tale adventure book series
author: Shari Tharp
